page.title: 18THE WULFRIC SCHOOL
page.content: The Wulfric School is situated on two sites at which there are 1350 pupils. There are 76 classrooms and 3 study rooms.There are 90 members of staff. The school day is from 8.50am until 12.00 and from 1.15pm until 4.00pm.The largest class may have 30 pupils but in the upper school there may only be three students.600 children stay at school for dinners and 200 stay for a sandwich meal.There is also a school tuck shop.In all school subjects there are rewards for good work but punish- ment for bad work or behavior takes the form of lost privileges,extra work, detention and 'the slipper' which is only given for very serious matters. The school has 4 secretaries,2 care- takers,many cleaners,a librarian and several ancillary staff.In Sept'85 there will be 2400 pupils at the school due to amalgamation.
